name: Classic Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, croutons, and a creamy Caesar dressing.

name: Heirloom Tomato Bruschetta
description: Toasted artisan bread topped with fresh heirloom tomatoes, garlic, basil, and a balsamic glaze.

name: Mushroom & Truffle Risotto
description: Creamy Arborio rice with wild mushrooms, parmesan, and a hint of white truffle oil.

name: Pan-Seared Scallops
description: Jumbo scallops seared to perfection, served with a lemon-butter sauce and asparagus.

name: Filet Mignon (8oz)
description: Center-cut filet mignon, grilled to your liking, served with potato gratin and red wine reduction.

name: Roasted Chicken Breast
description: Herb-roasted chicken breast with root vegetables and a natural pan jus.

name: Spicy Tuna Crispy Rice
description: Crispy fried rice topped with spicy tuna tartare, avocado, and a touch of serrano.

name: Butternut Squash Soup
description: Silky butternut squash soup with a hint of cinnamon and a crème fraîche swirl.

name: New York Cheesecake
description: Classic New York-style cheesecake with a graham cracker crust and berry coulis.

name: Vegan Chocolate Avocado Mousse
description: A rich and creamy chocolate mousse made from avocado, cocoa, and maple syrup.

name: Mini Crab Cakes
description: Bite-sized crab cakes with a zesty remoulade sauce.

name: Arugula & Pear Salad
description: Arugula, sliced pears, candied walnuts, goat cheese, and a champagne vinaigrette.

name: Braised Short Rib
description: Slow-braised beef short rib, falling off the bone, served with creamy polenta.

name: Lobster Mac & Cheese
description: Decadent macaroni and cheese with chunks of fresh lobster and a three-cheese blend.

name: Tiramisu
description: Classic Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.

name: Pork Belly Sliders
description: Crispy pork belly on a soft brioche bun with pickled onions and hoisin sauce.

name: Quinoa Stuffed Bell Peppers
description: Bell peppers stuffed with quinoa, black beans, corn, and spices, topped with avocado.

name: Shrimp Scampi
description: Shrimp sautéed with garlic, white wine, and butter, served over linguine.

name: French Onion Soup
description: Rich beef broth with caramelized onions, topped with a crusty baguette and melted Gruyère cheese.

name: Key Lime Pie
description: Tangy and sweet key lime filling in a graham cracker crust, topped with whipped cream.

name: Burrata with Prosciutto and Melon
description: Creamy burrata cheese served with thinly sliced prosciutto, fresh melon, and a drizzle of aged balsamic.

name: Beef Carpaccio
description: Thinly sliced raw beef tenderloin with arugula, capers, shaved Parmesan, and a lemon-dijon vinaigrette.

name: Steamed Mussels
description: A full pound of mussels steamed in a white wine, garlic, and herb broth, served with crusty bread.

name: Vegetable Spring Rolls
description: Crispy spring rolls filled with vegetables, served with a sweet chili dipping sauce.

name: Whipped Feta Dip
description: Creamy whipped feta and cream cheese dip topped with honey and pistachios, served with warm pita.

name: Pork Gyoza
description: Pan-fried pork and vegetable dumplings served with a savory ponzu dipping sauce.

name: Calamari Fritti
description: Lightly battered and fried calamari rings and tentacles, served with marinara and lemon aioli.

name: Tomato Basil Soup
description: A classic, creamy tomato soup infused with fresh basil.

name: Miso Soup
description: Traditional Japanese soup with tofu, seaweed, and scallions in a savory miso broth.

name: Greek Salad
description: Cucumbers, tomatoes, red onions, Kalamata olives, and feta cheese with a lemon-oregano vinaigrette.

name: Cobb Salad
description: Chopped greens with grilled chicken, bacon, avocado, hard-boiled egg, tomatoes, and blue cheese dressing.

name: Blackened Mahi-Mahi
description: Cajun-spiced Mahi-Mahi fillet, pan-seared and topped with a fresh mango salsa. Served with coconut rice.

name: Chicken Parmesan
description: Breaded chicken breast, fried and topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella, served over spaghetti.

name: Rack of Lamb
description: Herb and rosemary-crusted rack of lamb, roasted and served with a mint demi-glace and potato gratin.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
description: Layers of breaded eggplant, marinara, mozzarella, and Parmesan cheese, baked until golden.

name: Vegetable Curry
description: A medley of seasonal vegetables simmered in a fragrant coconut curry sauce, served with jasmine rice.

name: Garlic Mashed Potatoes
description: Creamy mashed potatoes with roasted garlic and butter.

name: Creamed Spinach
description: Classic steakhouse-style creamed spinach with a hint of nutmeg.

name: Roasted Brussels Sprouts
description: Brussels sprouts roasted until crispy, tossed with bacon and a balsamic glaze.

name: Crème Brûlée
description: Rich vanilla bean custard with a perfectly caramelized sugar crust.

name: Molten Chocolate Lava Cake
description: A decadent, individual chocolate cake with a warm, liquid chocolate center, served with raspberry sauce.

name: Peruvian Ceviche
description: Fresh fish cured in citrus juices, spiced with chili peppers, and served with red onion, cilantro, and sweet potato.

name: Chicken Satay with Peanut Sauce
description: Grilled chicken skewers marinated in coconut milk and spices, served with a rich and savory peanut dipping sauce.

name: Hummus Platter
description: Creamy chickpea hummus served with warm pita bread, cucumber, and cherry tomatoes.

name: Argentinian Beef Empanadas
description: Flaky pastry filled with seasoned ground beef, onions, and olives, baked until golden.

name: Pad Thai with Shrimp
description: Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, tofu, bean sprouts, and peanuts in a tangy tamarind sauce.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Grilled chicken chunks in a spiced, creamy tomato-based curry sauce, served with basmati rice.

name: Carne Asada Tacos
description: Three corn tortillas filled with grilled marinated steak, topped with onion, cilantro, and salsa verde.

name: Sushi Platter
description: Assortment of California rolls, spicy tuna rolls, and salmon nigiri, served with soy sauce, wasabi, and ginger.

name: Falafel Wrap
description: Crispy falafel balls in a warm pita wrap with lettuce, tomatoes, and tahini sauce.

name: Lamb Gyro
description: Sliced roasted lamb in a fluffy pita with tomatoes, onions, and a creamy tzatziki sauce.

name: Tom Yum Soup
description: A classic Thai hot and sour soup with shrimp, mushrooms, lemongrass, and lime leaves.

name: Vegetable Samosas
description: Crispy fried pastry filled with spiced potatoes and peas, served with a mint chutney.

name: Baklava
description: A rich, sweet dessert pastry made of layers of filo filled with chopped nuts and sweetened with honey syrup.

name: Mango Sticky Rice
description: A traditional Thai dessert made with glutinous rice, fresh mango, and a sweet coconut milk sauce.

name: Paella Valenciana
description: A Spanish classic with saffron-infused rice, chicken, rabbit, shrimp, mussels, and vegetables.

name: Korean Bibimbap
description: A bowl of warm rice topped with sautéed vegetables, chili paste, a fried egg, and sliced beef.

name: Jamaican Jerk Chicken
description: Chicken marinated in a fiery jerk spice blend, grilled over an open flame, and served with rice and peas.

name: Greek Moussaka
description: A rich, baked casserole of layered eggplant, spiced ground lamb, and a creamy béchamel sauce.

name: Vietnamese Pho (Beef)
description: A fragrant noodle soup with a rich beef broth, thin slices of beef, and fresh herbs like basil, mint, and cilantro.

name: Tres Leches Cake
description: A sponge cake soaked in three kinds of milk: evaporated milk, condensed milk, and heavy cream.
